logo.class: flex items-center text-indigo-400 no-underline hover:no-underline font-bold text-2xl lg:text-4xl

flair.class: bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-green-400 via-pink-500 to-purple-500

link.class: inline-block text-blue-300 no-underline hover:text-pink-500 hover:text-underline text-center h-10 p-2 md:h-auto md:p-4 transform hover:scale-125 duration-300 ease-in-out

main.class: container pt-24 md:pt-8 mx-auto flex flex-wrap flex-col md:flex-row items-center

wrap.class: flex flex-col w-full xl:w-2/5 justify-center lg:items-start overflow-y-hidden

h1.class: my-4 text-3xl md:text-5xl text-white opacity-75 font-bold leading-tight text-center md:text-left

flair.class: bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-green-400 via-pink-500 to-purple-500

p.class: leading-normal text-base md:text-2xl mb-8 text-center md:text-left

form.class: bg-gray-900 opacity-75 w-full shadow-lg rounded-lg px-8 pt-6 pb-8 mb-4

input.class: shadow appearance-none border rounded w-full p-3 text-gray-700 leading-tight focus:ring transform transition hover:scale-105 duration-300 ease-in-out

submit.class: bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-800 to-green-500 hover:from-pink-500 hover:to-green-500 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded focus:ring transform transition hover:scale-105 duration-300 ease-in-out

more.class: bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-800 to-gray-500 hover:from-pink-500 hover:to-green-500 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded focus:ring transform transition hover:scale-105 duration-300 ease-in-out

img.class: mx-auto w-full md:w-4/5 transform -rotate-6 transition hover:scale-105 duration-700 ease-in-out hover:rotate-6

footer.class: text-white-400 w-full pt-16 pb-6 text-sm text-center md:text-left fade-in
